name: Solar System (itch) (sachikorobison)
description:
Modifications to the tutorial:

Added the following planets (using + > 3D Object > Sphere) , as well as their corresponding Textures/Materials, and the "RotateAround" Script: Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune

Added "dronehum" sound to the following planets: Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune

Created by Sachiko Robison using Unity Hub

Assets provided by Michigan State University
